alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:09PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Graham County through 400 PM MST... At 309 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Poker Mountain, or 47 miles northwest of Clifton, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly remote areas of north central Graham County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
